caseTitle: Federation of Pakistan through Secretary Ministry of Law and Justice Islamabad v. Mr. Fazal-e-Subhan & others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Appointment of Judges under Article 175A of the Constitution of Pakistan. (2) Judicial Commission of Pakistan Rules, 2010 and Parliamentary Committee on Judges Appointment in the Superior Courts Rules, 2010. (3) Scope and powers of Judicial Commission and Parliamentary Committee. (4) Doctrine of stare decisis (vertical and horizontal) & doctrine of binding precedent.
